# MPG vs Horsepower

This is a graph about food:

```{r}
#| label: food-margin
#| fig-cap: "Different kinds of food."
#| column: margin
#| message: false
library(ggplot2)
mtcars2 <- mtcars
mtcars2$am <- factor(
  mtcars$am, labels = c('chocolate', 'vanilla')
)
ggplot(mtcars2, aes(hp, mpg, color = am)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth() +
  theme(legend.position = 'bottom')
```

Showing it bigger:
